crazy.tools

类 WebTable

extends Object

      construct with parameters initialize.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String cellText(int row, int col)
      get the cell text of the table on specified row and column.
      org.openqa.selenium.WebElement childItem(int row, int col, String type, int index)
      get the element in the table cell by row and col index.

      get column count of a specified webtable row.

      get row count of a webtable.

      to get the web table body element.
      org.openqa.selenium.WebElement tableElement()
      to get the whole web table element.
      org.openqa.selenium.WebElement tableHeader()
      to get the web table head element.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • WebTable

        public WebTable(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                org.openqa.selenium.By tabFinder,
                String bodyOrHead)
        construct with parameters initialize.
        参数:
        driver - the WebDriver instance.
        tabFinder - the By locator of the table.
        bodyOrHead - choice of table body and head to operate.

      • WebTable

        public WebTable(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver,
                org.openqa.selenium.By tabFinder)
        construct with parameters initialize.
        参数:
        driver - the WebDriver instance.
        tabFinder - the By locator of the table.

    • 方法详细资料

      • tableElement

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement tableElement()
        to get the whole web table element.
        返回:
        the table element.

      • tableHeader

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement tableHeader()
        to get the web table head element.
        返回:
        the first table head element.

      • tableBody

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement tableBody()
        to get the web table body element.
        返回:
        the first table body element.

      • rowCount

        public int rowCount()
        get row count of a webtable.
        返回:
        the row count of the table.

      • colCount

        public int colCount(int rowNum)
        get column count of a specified webtable row.
        参数:
        rowNum - row index of your table to count.
        返回:
        the column count of the row in table.

      • childItem

        public org.openqa.selenium.WebElement childItem(int row,
                                                int col,
                                                String type,
                                                int index)
        get the element in the table cell by row and col index.
        参数:
        row - row index of the table.
        col - column index of the table.
        type - the element type, such as "img"/"a"/"input"...
        index - element index in the specified cell, begins with 1.
        返回:
        the table cell WebElement.

      • cellText

        public String cellText(int row,
                       int col)
        get the cell text of the table on specified row and column.
        参数:
        row - row index of the table.
        col - column index of the table.
        返回:
        the cell text.
